columns.name: IMPLANT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the implant record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PREP_SOLN_SOAK_DURA
columns.description: The length of time each implant was prepared and soaked in different solutions per protocol.

columns.name: PREP_SOLN_MFR_C_NAME
columns.description: This item is used to document the manufacturer of the tissue preparation solution.

columns.name: PREP_SOLN_SERIAL_NM
columns.description: This item is used to document the tissue preparation solution serial number.

columns.name: TISSUE_PREP_START_DTTM
columns.description: This column stores the tissue prep start time.

columns.name: TISSUE_PREP_END_DTTM
columns.description: This column stores the tissue prep end time.

columns.name: PREP_SOLN_RINSE_DURATION
columns.description: Stores the length of time each implant is rinsed in different solutions.

columns.name: PREP_SOLN_QTY
columns.description: Stores the number of tissue prep solution containers that were used.
